last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter 20: It Takes Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: The island welcomes a new era.

name: Summer Camp Island
overview: Oscar and Hedgehog are dropped off at a strange summer camp, full of fantastical things ranging from magical camp counselors to sticky notes that are portals to other dimensions.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog arrive on Summer Camp Island and figure out pretty quickly that most normal summer camps don't have witch-counselors, aliens and talking trees.

guest_stars.character: Monster Under the Bed / Oscar's Dad (voice)
guest_stars.name: Alfred Molina

episodes.name: Monster Babies
episodes.overview: Alice lures Oscar and his monster friends for a tea party, but only to turn the monsters into cute babies.

episodes.name: Chocolate Money Badgers
episodes.overview: Oscar learns that he can earn merit badges that unlock prizes.

episodes.name: Saxophone Come Home
episodes.overview: Oscar befriends a teenage Yeti.

episodes.name: Pajama Pajimjams
episodes.overview: Oscar pretends to be a talking pair of pajamas named Jimjams to make his friend Pajamas happy.

episodes.name: Oscar & Hedgehog's Melody
episodes.overview: Susie holds the annual talent show that has the rest of the campers competing to win.

episodes.name: Feeling Spacey
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog arrive on a planet that has no emotions.

episodes.name: Ghost the Boy
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog befriend a ghost who can't remember who he is.

episodes.name: Computer Vampire
episodes.overview: Oscar finds a mysterious old video game in the library.

episodes.name: The Basketball Liaries
episodes.overview: With help from Basketball, Oscar makes an impressive shot that scores him a spot on the Gold League.

episodes.name: Popular Banana Split
episodes.overview: Hedgehog and Max discover a tiny high school when they are accidentally shrunk by a science experiment.

episodes.name: Time Traveling Quick Pants
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog learn about a quicksand that lets them go back in time.

episodes.name: It's My Party
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog are tasked with throwing Susie a birthday party; they need to hire an awesome boy band, lasso some unicorns and more standard magical party stuff.

episodes.name: Moon Problems
episodes.overview: The Moon gets sad when Oscar loses his friendship bracelet.

episodes.name: Monster Visit
episodes.overview: The monsters get nervous when their Godmonster comes for a visit.

episodes.name: Ice Cream Headache
episodes.overview: The campers get magical powers from the witches supply of magic ice cream.

episodes.name: Pepper's Blanket Is Missing
episodes.overview: Pepper's blanket goes missing at a cabin sleepover.

episodes.name: Hedgehog Werewolf
episodes.overview: Hedgehog gets bit by a cute puppy and is starting to act strange.

episodes.name: Mr. Softball
episodes.overview: Oscar and his friends are challenged to a game of softball by Susie and the witch camp counselors; the campers try to play fair, but it is incredibly obvious that the witches are using their magic to cheat.

episodes.name: Fuzzy Pink Time Babies
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog learn how to Stop Time.

episodes.name: Cosmic Bupkiss
episodes.overview: A storm blocks Oscar and Hedgehog's one chance to see a comet.

episodes.name: Radio Silence
episodes.overview: Oscar must get Hedgehog a special sandwich in order to save their friendship.

episodes.name: Director's Cut
episodes.overview: Oscar receives a camcorder from his parents and sets out to prove to them the magic on the island is real.

episodes.name: The Haunted Campfire
episodes.overview: The campers must battle ghosts of their own creation after their scary stories mysteriously come true.

episodes.name: I Heart Heartforde
episodes.overview: Oscar, hedgehog and the other campers are excited to take a trip to the non-magical town of Heartforde.

episodes.name: Space Invasion
episodes.overview: A visit from Puddle the alien tests the limit of Oscar's hosting skills.

episodes.name: Momsoon
episodes.overview: Hedgehog gets a call during her radio show from someone who needs her help.

episodes.name: Sneeze Guard
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog must work with the witches to cure Alice's camp-threatening illness.

episodes.name: Susie's Fantastical Scavenger Hunt
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog must learn to exist without each other when they are put on different teams during a scavenger hunt.

episodes.name: Mop Forever
episodes.overview: At Alice's dress-up party the campers are magically turned into their costumes.

episodes.name: Pajamas Party
episodes.overview: When Pajamas starts to panic that Oscar will outgrow her, Oscar tries to help but things go awry.

episodes.name: The Soundhouse
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog discover a new structure on the island and become friends with its caretaker.

episodes.name: Puff Paint
episodes.overview: Oscar's painting is unpopular so he goes on a journey of self-discovery.

episodes.name: Susie Appreciation Day
episodes.overview: Hedgehog and Oscar find themselves trapped in Susie's cabin and must escape undetected.

episodes.name: Campers Above the Bed
episodes.overview: Hedgehog finds a city underneath her bed as she looks for her missing diary.

episodes.name: Midnight Quittance
episodes.overview: Ramona invites Hedgehog and Oscar to participate in a special holiday ritual.

episodes.name: The Great Elf Invention Convention
episodes.overview: Oscar, Max, and Hedgehog do a favor for Barb the elf in exchange for some chips.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Hedgehogs
episodes.overview: Hedgehog wants to win the Golden Science Badge but runs into some unexpected competition.

episodes.name: Spell Crushers
episodes.overview: Hedgehog tries to get over a crush so she can regain her focus on magic.

episodes.name: The Library
episodes.overview: The campers spend a rainy day at the library.

episodes.name: Meeting of the Minds
episodes.overview: While Oscar helps Hedgehog find her wand, Susie tries to convince the Meeting of the Minds that Hedgehog isn't responsible enough for magic.

episodes.name: Ava's Yard Sale
episodes.overview: To help Ava overcome stage fright, Hedgehog takes Ava's violin into her own hands, while Oscar calls in for some reinforcements.

episodes.name: Molar Moles
episodes.overview: Oscar's fib about his last baby tooth alerts the Molar Mole Fraud Squad, and Hedgehog jumps to his defense at a kooky mole trail.

episodes.name: Tortilla Towel
episodes.overview: After making Oscar's tortilla towel dreams come true, he and Hedgehog find that running a business is harder than they thought.

episodes.name: Acorn Graduation
episodes.overview: Hedgehog endures her first magic lesson with Susie, while Oscar sets out to save her seat for a mut-see event: Acorn Graduation!

episodes.name: Dungeon Doug
episodes.overview: On a trip into the world of Dungeon Doug, Oscar and his dad find themselves on a father-son bonding mission.

episodes.name: Tub on the Run
episodes.overview: While Hedgehog and Max scour the island in search of a missing tub, everyone is dying to know: are things weird between them?

episodes.name: Spotted Bear Stretch
episodes.overview: On the eve of the Spotted Bear Stretch, Oscar and his pajamas are stuck at Susie's place as unwelcome house guests.

episodes.name: French Toasting
episodes.overview: Lucy's suspicious behavior prompts Oscar and Hedgehog to investigate whether or not she's the kingpin of a secret society.

episodes.name: We'll Just Move the Stars
episodes.overview: When an astrological mismatch threatens King and Puddle's wedding, Oscar and Hedgehog join them on a quest to ensure love conquers all.

episodes.name: Catacombs
episodes.overview: Oscar, Hedgehog, Lucy, and Saxophone must return a yeti comb to its home to save the island from a really bad hair day.

episodes.name: Wild Hearts Can't Be Caboodled
episodes.overview: Things get wonky when Oscar and Hedgehog use magic to get an edge on their fellow campers in the Rainbow Unicorn Badge contest.

episodes.name: The Later Pile
episodes.overview: Hedgehog convinces Oscar to tackle an overdue rent -- but this time, Oscar's procrastination habit has spooky consequences.

episodes.name: Honeydew Hatch
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog enter Frozen Time with the help of Ramona grow time babies, but Ramona and Susie's broken friendship causes problems.

episodes.name: Light as a Feather
episodes.overview: While Hedgehog braves her first witch coven sleepover, Oscar awaits a secret signal in case she needs to be rescued.

episodes.name: When Harry Met Barry
episodes.overview: Faced with two potential husbands -- burly Harry and sensitive Barry -- Barb enlists Hedgehog and Oscar to help her weigh her options.

episodes.name: Oddjobs
episodes.overview: Hedgehog and Oscar investigate problems at the U.M.P.S. and meet the new intern, Oddjobs, who's a great friend but a terrible employee.

episodes.name: Tumble Dry Low
episodes.overview: When Hedgehog's podcast blows up, she must decide whether to ride the wave of fame or stay true to her small but loyal fan base.

episodes.name: Just You and Me
episodes.overview: The full moon finds Betsy withholding her big werewolf secret from Susie, who spends the night trying to figure out what her BFF is up to.

episodes.name: Glow Worm
episodes.overview: While Hedgehog is off "werewolfing," a deflated Oscar has a therapy session with Shark that helps him realize the magic within him.

episodes.name: Susie and Ramona Chapter 1: Susie's Ark
episodes.overview: When Susie learns magic is beginning to disappear from New York, she tries to lead all the magical creatures to safety.

episodes.name: Susie and Ramona Chapter 2: Ghost Baby Jabberwock
episodes.overview: Susie, Ramona, and Barb team up in frozen time to see what's threatening magic.

episodes.name: Susie and Ramona Chapter 3: Meet Me in Massachusetts
episodes.overview: Susie and Ramona train a gaggle of witches until they have a full coven.

episodes.name: Susie and Ramona Chapter 4: Witches in the City
episodes.overview: Ramona sends Susie back to New York in search of new magical creatures.

episodes.name: Puddle and the King Chapter 1: Honey Moondog
episodes.overview: The king leaves Hedgehog and Oscar in charge of the kingdom while he and Puddle are away - their only duty is to carry out the Swan-Upping

episodes.name: Puddle and the King Chapter 2: Royally Bored
episodes.overview: Hedgehog and Oscar discover alien jesters who live under the floorboards of the castle.

episodes.name: Puddle and the King Chapter 3: All the King’s Slides
episodes.overview: Oscar, Hedgehog and Puddle must figure out what's wrong with the King when he orders the aliens to turn all the planet's sugar into salt.

episodes.name: Yeti Confetti Chapter 1: Don’t Tell Lucy
episodes.overview: Oscar has to distract Lucy while the Yetis prepare a surprise for her.

episodes.name: Yeti Confetti Chapter 2:  The Yum Whisperer
episodes.overview: Lucy and a young yeti named Fife argue about the right way to raise a litter of baby yetis they found.

episodes.name: Yeti Confetti Chapter 3: The Sherbet Scoop
episodes.overview: Lucy decides to tell a story during a Yeti cloud-making ceremony about a Yeti Elder she doesn’t know.

episodes.name: Yeti Confetti Chapter 4: Lucy's Instrument
episodes.overview: Lucy goes to Yeti school to find her instrument.

episodes.name: Yeti Confetti Chapter 5: Where's the Confetti
episodes.overview: When it doesn't snow on the final day of Yeti Confetti, a Yeti Elder blames Lucy. In order to prove she belongs Lucy tries to find a way to make it snow.

episodes.name: Sea Bunnies
episodes.overview: Shortly after discovering an underwater portal, Oscar learns that his return ticket is an errand for Susie.

episodes.name: Mushrumours
episodes.overview: Alice suffers the consequences of accidentally spreading a rumor about mushrooms.

episodes.name: Breakfast Like Gene Kelly
episodes.overview: Oscar attempts to make the breakfast of his dreams.

episodes.name: Spirit Balls
episodes.overview: Susie and Ramona teach the witches how to make spirit balls.

episodes.name: Oscar & His Demon
episodes.overview: Oscar works to overcome his fear of crossing a very scary bridge.

episodes.name: The Emily Ghost Institute for Manners and Magical Etiquette
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog go to a magical etiquette class.

episodes.name: Jeremiah
episodes.overview: Oscar finds and cares for a magical root from Susie's yard.

episodes.name: Tomorrow's Bananas
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog get an unsettling glimpse into the future.

episodes.name: Shave a Little Off the Wheel
episodes.overview: A mouse in heels befriends a rogue snowflake.

episodes.name: He's Just Not Here Right Now
episodes.overview: Oscar and Hedgehog encounter New Jersey’s most famous piece of folklore.

episodes.name: Hark the Gerald Sings
episodes.overview: Oscar confronts an age-old superstition.

episodes.name: Hall of Mooms
episodes.overview: Hedgehog tries to get her broom back.

episodes.name: Pepper and the Fog
episodes.overview: After the island gets covered in fog, Pepper attempts to make it to Susie's house.

episodes.name: Barb and the Spotted Bears Chapter 1: A Barb is Born
episodes.overview: On the third day of the world, Barb tries to save the ferns from being eaten by the spotted bears. But the bears are only getting hungrier and hungrier – will Barb be able to stop the ferns from going extinct?

episodes.name: Barb and the Spotted Bears Chapter 2: Hot Milk and Careless Whispers
episodes.overview: Barb tries to soothe the spotted bears with a dreamy invention, but soon finds herself outnumbered. Will Barb be able to even the playing field – or will she become the bears’ next snack?

episodes.name: Barb and the Spotted Bears Chapter 3: Nightcap
episodes.overview: Barb and the elves band together to protect the source of all magic from a pair of fiendish intruders. But will Barb be able to outsmart two rascals as old as the world itself?

episodes.name: Betsy and Ghost Chapter 1: Burps 'n Sighs
episodes.overview: On the eve of Ramona’s exile to Frozen Time, Susie tries to get rid of the sad memory of their relationship, but soon finds herself haunted by the past.

episodes.name: Betsy and Ghost Chapter 2: Boo Jeans
episodes.overview: It’s Betsy’s first night on Summer Camp Island, and she’s looking forward to a cozy evening in with a nice cup of tea. But when Alice convinces her to participate in an initiation ritual, Betsy gets lost in the woods.

episodes.name: Betsy and Ghost Chapter 3: There's A Racket In My Hope Chest
episodes.overview: The witches search for Betsy – who doesn’t want to be found. Can she learn to love being a witch as much as she loves being a ghost?

episodes.name: Susie and her Sister Chapter 1: Heathers
episodes.overview: Susie’s new little sister has a gift for magic, but it’s causing problems for the community. Will Susie learn to accept that Mildred is more powerful, and will the townsfolk be able to accept the most powerful witch in the world?

episodes.name: Susie and her Sister Chapter 2: Hot Corn Girls
episodes.overview: On her 15th birthday, Susie must prepare for her Gibbous Rite Ceremony. Will Mildred be able to keep her chaotic magic in check for just one day so Susie can become the full witch woman of her dreams?

episodes.name: Susie and her Sister Chapter 3: Mildred's Friend
episodes.overview: Locked in a standoff with Susie over who will say sorry first, Mildred runs away to the woods and befriends a ghost. Will one of the McAllister sisters give in and apologize before the townsfolk run Mildred out of town?

episodes.name: Oscar and the Monsters Chapter 1: Unaccompanied Oscar
episodes.overview: When Oscar isn’t invited to Alexa’s birthday party, Mortimer tries to make him feel better by telling him about a similar time in his life. Ever the glowworm, Oscar sneaks back in time to help a young Mortimer overcome the sad experience.

episodes.name: Oscar and the Monsters Chapter 2: Tiny Outburst Society
episodes.overview: After discovering that young Mortimer doesn’t have any friends, Oscar helps him start a new club on campus. But the monsters are forced to hide their newfound friendship from the school – and Stuart.

episodes.name: Oscar and the Monsters Chapter 3: Witches' Brew
episodes.overview: Mortimer and the monsters must figure out how to send Oscar back to his own time, but the only person that can help is the foe of monsters everywhere: a witch. Will they all be able to work together to get Oscar back to Hedgehog?

episodes.name: The Babies Chapter 1: Breakfast Errands
episodes.overview: Frustrated that he doesn’t know his magical identity, Oliver convinces Susie to tell him by means of nonviolent protest. Not wanting anyone in her house, Susie takes Oliver on a series of errands to help him figure it out.

episodes.name: The Babies Chapter 2: Teacup Giant
episodes.overview: Susie sends Alexa to the Fjords to train as a giant, but her small size causes her to lag behind. Will Alexa be able to fake it until she makes it – or are these boots too enormous to fill?

episodes.name: The Babies Chapter 3: Lem Is Nothing
episodes.overview: After landing in trouble with Susie, Lem runs away to Frozen Time to hide at Ramona’s but is soon sniffed out by the fearsome Jabberwock. Later, Lem must decide whose wrath is worse: that of the Jabberwock, or a very grumpy Suze.

episodes.name: Chapter 1: The Legs
episodes.overview: Susie must rely on Oscar and Hedgehog in unimaginable ways after a magic trick gone wrong.

episodes.name: Chapter 2: If I Only Had a Wand
episodes.overview: Hedgehog reckons with her mother's disapproval of magic.

episodes.name: Chapter 3: See Bees? Gee! Bees!
episodes.overview: Oscar heads to the Sasquatch Monastery in search of enlightenment.

episodes.name: Chapter 4: Pepper's Funeral
episodes.overview: With help from Pepper, Susie is able to lay a special dream of hers to rest.

episodes.name: Chapter 5: The Hits
episodes.overview: Barb and the Alien King take an eventful walk around the island.

episodes.name: Chapter 6: Miracle Rabbit
episodes.overview: Oscar and Ramona run an errand on the moon.

episodes.name: Chapter 7: The Three Grrs
episodes.overview: Oscar helps the aliens with a special jester ritual that happens once every fifty years.

episodes.name: Chapter 8: Go Get Our Girls
episodes.overview: Hedgehog and Oscar search for the missing coven members.

episodes.name: Chapter 9: Storybook Susie
episodes.overview: Susie details her travels around the world.

episodes.name: Chapter 10: The Last Witch
episodes.overview: Hedgehog worries that she may be too little to make big witch decisions.

episodes.name: Chapter 11: The Metaphysical Reserve
episodes.overview: Susie steps through a portal into another realm.

episodes.name: Chapter 12: Night's Pockets
episodes.overview: Pajamas and Jimjams try to find Time.

episodes.name: Chapter 13: Jar Guard
episodes.overview: Mildred's Friend tells a cautionary tale.

episodes.name: Chapter 14: Bear With Me
episodes.overview: A surprise visitor arrives on Summer Camp Island.

episodes.name: Chapter 15: Croissant Moon
episodes.overview: The magical creatures work together to send Mildred on a mission so they can have a special bedtime.

episodes.name: Chapter 16: Retrace Our Hooves
episodes.overview: Susie makes contact in another realm.

episodes.name: Chapter 17: Meeting of Mounds
episodes.overview: The Coven challenges The Cuties to an impromptu softball game.

episodes.name: Chapter 18: Swellington Boots
episodes.overview: When a summer storm brews, the crew cozies up in the library.

episodes.name: Chapter 19: Weather Your Weather
episodes.overview: Susie mulls over her past.

episodes.name: Chapter 20: It Takes Time
episodes.overview: The island welcomes a new era.
